import cv2
import numpy as np
def nothing(x):
    pass
img = cv2.imread('img/jp.jpg',0)
windowName = "nxw"
cv2.namedWindow(windowName,cv2.WINDOW_AUTOSIZE)
cv2.createTrackbar('Type',windowName,0,4,nothing)
cv2.createTrackbar('Value',windowName,0,255,nothing)
while(1):
    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == 27: #用于保持窗口及按Esc键退出
        break
    #获取当前滑动条指示的值
    Type = cv2.getTrackbarPos('Type',windowName)
    Value = cv2.getTrackbarPos('Value',windowName)
    ret, dst = cv2.threshold(img, Value, 255, Type)
    cv2.imshow(windowName, dst)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
def nothing(x):
    pass
img = np.ones((512, 512, 3), np.uint8)
windowName = "nxw"
cv2.namedWindow(windowName,cv2.WINDOW_AUTOSIZE)
cv2.createTrackbar('R',windowName,0,255,nothing)
cv2.createTrackbar('G',windowName,0,255,nothing)
cv2.createTrackbar('B',windowName,0,255,nothing)
while(1):
    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == 27:
        break
    r = cv2.getTrackbarPos('R',windowName)
    g = cv2.getTrackbarPos('G',windowName)
    b = cv2.getTrackbarPos('B',windowName)
    img[:,:,] = [b, g, r]
    cv2.imshow(windowName, img)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
#定义一个回调函数，此程序无须回调
def nothing(x):
    pass
img = cv2.imread('img/jp.jpg',0)#读取图像
#定义窗口名称对象，方便后续调用
windowName = "NLH"
cv2.namedWindow(windowName,cv2.WINDOW_AUTOSIZE)
#创建用于颜色变换的滑动条
cv2.createTrackbar('Type',windowName,0,4,nothing)      #5种基本阈值类型
cv2.createTrackbar('Value',windowName,0,255,nothing)    #阈值范围为0～255
while(1):
    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == 27: #用于保持窗口及按Esc键退出
        break
    #获取当前滑动条指示的值
    Type = cv2.getTrackbarPos('Type',windowName)
    Value = cv2.getTrackbarPos('Value',windowName)
    #阈值处理函数
    ret, dst = cv2.threshold(img, Value, 255, Type)
    #显示图像
    cv2.imshow(windowName, dst)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np

cv2.createTrackbar('G', windowName, 0, 255, nothing)

    b = cv2.getTrackbarPos('B', windowName)

    # 将当前滑动条的值应用到图像上
    img[:, :] = [b, g, r]

    cv2.imshow(windowName, img)

题目1.正确答案:
正确答案：
import cv2# 定义一个回调函数，此程序无须回调def nothing(x):    passimg = cv2.imread('./sucai4/jp.jpg', 0)  # 读取图像# 定义窗口名称对象，方便后续调用windowName = "JXJ"cv2.namedWindow(windowName, cv2.WINDOW_AUTOSIZE)# 创建用于颜色变换的滑动条cv2.createTrackbar('Type', windowName, 0, 4, nothing)  # 5种基本阈值类型cv2.createTrackbar('Value', windowName, 0, 255, nothing)  # 阈值范围为0～255# 循环显示阈值处理结果while (1):    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == 27:  # 用于保持窗口及按Esc键退出        break    # 获取当前滑动条指示的值    Type = cv2.getTrackbarPos('Type', windowName)    Value = cv2.getTrackbarPos('Value', windowName)    # 阈值处理函数    ret, dst = cv2.threshold(img, Value, 255, Type)    # 显示图像    cv2.imshow(windowName, dst)cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np# 定义一个回调函数，此程序无需回调def nothing(x):    pass# 创建一个空白图像img = np.zeros((512, 512, 3), np.uint8)# 定义窗口名称对象，方便后续调用windowName = "JXJ"cv2.namedWindow(windowName, cv2.WINDOW_AUTOSIZE)# 创建用于颜色变换的滑动条cv2.createTrackbar('R', windowName, 0, 255, nothing)cv2.createTrackbar('G', windowName, 0, 255, nothing)cv2.createTrackbar('B', windowName, 0, 255, nothing)# 循环显示颜色变换while (1):    # 用于保持窗口及按ESC退出    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == 27:        break    # 获取当前滑动条指示的值    r = cv2.getTrackbarPos('R', windowName)    g = cv2.getTrackbarPos('G', windowName)    b = cv2.getTrackbarPos('B', windowName)    img[:,:,] = [b,g,r]    cv2.imshow(windowName, img)cv2.destroyAllWindows()
